mdRecord.dcterms:title: Criminal Warrants, Justice of the Peace: Commonwealth vs C.T. Boyd
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Commonwealth vs C.T. Boyd Offense: Threat of personal harm Victim and Complainant: John W. Boothe Recorded in Floyd County Courthouse 08.16.1887 Guilty, James M. Boyd paid surety of $50.00 as did C.T. Boyd for 6 months of good behavior to be discharged later Court cost: $4.00
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Court Records
Warrants (Law)
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: The Circuit Court of Floyd County
Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
